name: Protect The Square
description:
A Game Written In C Using SDL2  over the period of about 24 hours because I had to scrap my original idea due to issues with the web build, with that said, this web build also has some errors, like no font so :/, you won't be able to see your score but I hope you enjoy. Some SFX. Try to protect the spaceship/square and don't let it break. To make the game I used a small SDL-Base I made but that sadly broke the web build so I went back to the Old-SDL-Base which can be found in the GitHub repo linked somewhere below. This is the second installment of the Mini Jam series and kind of like a reboot to the very first one except simpler art and a little better of an idea. The next one will come soon as well.

The Controls:

  • Up Arrow - Move Up
  • Down Arrow - Move Down

It will be added to the following GitHub as well: 

  • C/C++ Game Dev

External Assets:

  • m5x7
